name: lost Relic Games - Danger Of Electric Shock
name_original: lost Relic Games - Danger Of Electric Shock
description:
Thank  you for choosing to play  Danger of Electric Shock , made for the Lost Relic Games  game jam 

collect the DC power to grow your Electric  Snake but avoid the AC power which will Reset your Progress,

then connect the points to close the circuit. 

Controls move  WASD or arrow keys  

R - restart ,  Enter - Continue

this was my first time making music with BandLab.
Art was made my me

fonts used for name Hacked by David Libeau

https://www.fontspace.com/hacked-font-f28425
